Notifications.Name: User Password Changed
Notifications.Description: This notification will be generated when the password for your user account is changed.

Notifications.Name: User Profile Updated
Notifications.Description: This notification will be generated when your user profile information is updated.

Description: Notifications related to notes and comments.

Notifications.Name: New Mention
Notifications.Description: This notification will be generated when you are mentioned in a note or comment.
